course.title: PSY 3121 Psychology of Women (3 units)
course.desc: Theoretical and methodological issues concerning women. Sexual dimorphism, biology and socialization experiences. Gender stereotypes. Familial, occupational, and other societal roles. Identity and self-concept in relation to social norms. Mental health and well-being. Violence against women. Current research in psychology of women.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: PSY 1101, PSY 1102.
